Name: Rocky Trail
Description: You are on a rock-strewn trail

Name: South of House
Description: You are facing the south side of a white house

Name: Canyon View
Description: You are on top of the great canyon on its south wall

Name: Forest
Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you

Name: West of House
Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door

Name: Behind House
Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar

Name: Dense Woods
Description: This is a dimily lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there apperas to be sunlight

Name: North of House
Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. These is no door here, and all the windows are barred

Name: Clearing
Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surronding you on the west and south
